common.appDescription: A modern, extensible web application framework built with React and powered by plugins. Create scalable applications with ease.

tabs.welcome: Welcome to the admin panel. Please select a menu item to get started.

errors.menuItemPositionRequired: Menu item must have a position property
errors.invalidMenuItemPosition: Invalid menu item position: {position}. Must be 'admin', 'public', or 'user'
errors.navbarItemPositionRequired: Navbar item must have a position property
errors.invalidNavbarItemPosition: Invalid navbar position: {position}. Must be 'admin' or 'public'
errors.layoutPositionRequired: Layout must have a position property
errors.invalidLayoutPosition: Invalid layout position: {position}. Must be 'admin' or 'public'
errors.pluginNameAndTranslationsRequired: Plugin name and translations are required
errors.providerNameAndComponentRequired: Provider must have a name and component
